about_the_game:
Felicat has returned home and is hiding around making new feline friends. She is on the streets of the city, cafes, windows, trees on her adventure to enjoy every new corner of this urban odyssey. After her space travels and beyond, nothing better than returning home to purr in search of an owner and hide around.

Find more than 100 cats scattered around the cities of Rome, Paris, San Francisco, Moscow and New York. There are new colorful and relaxing arts to choose from on the city map where you will search for cats.

Collect Special Cards

Zoom in and zoom out to get closer details.



Be patient! Hold your anxiety! Relax and travel through the city to find Felicat’s friends, the astronaut cat.

name: Felicat’s Urban Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Felicat's Urban Odyssey is a hidden object where players explore city environments to find cats and Felicat, players will have a blast exploring the city and discovering new feline friends, and is sure to be a hit with cat lovers. Join the adventure and discover new feline friends in this journey!
